attributes.action: PLEASE STOP EMPLOYERS CHECKING CREDIT FILES AND TURNING US DOWN FOR DIFFICULTIES WHEN THE RECESSION IS THE REASON WE ARE MISSING PMTS AND AFTER LOSING JOBS IT IS A VICIOUS CIRCLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I LOST MY JOB IN SPET 08 -COULDNT GET ANOTHER JOB IN FINANCE AND AS I HAD NO INCOME MY LOAN AND CREDIT CARDS HAD TO BE ARRANGED - HOWEVER APPLYING FOR A JOB IN FINANCE I WAS TURNED DOWN AS I HAD MISSED PYMTS ???THIS IS UNFAIR AND IS A VICIOUS CIRCLE FOR US ALL - WHEN BANKS GET A BAILOUT WHY ARE CREDIT CHECKS AFFECTING OUR JOBS - I AM HONEST AND TELL THE TRUTH AND IT WOULDNT HURT TO ASK ME RATHER THAN TURN ME DOWN 

I FEEL GORDON BROWN SHOULD IMPOSE A BAN FOR THE TIME BEING AS WE ARE ALL STRUGGLING AND CREDIT CHECKS ARE A DPA ISSUE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
